item.description:
Katherine Stewart, author of The Good News Club: The Christian Right's Stealth Assault on America's Children, has been invited by the Boston Skeptics to talk about her work at their May meeting of Skeptics in the Pub. Information about her other appearances in the area -- including with the groups Americans United and the Greater Worcester Humanities -- look at the "appearances" page of her website, http://www.thegoodnewsclub.com.

Information about the Boston Skeptics event can be found at http://bostonskeptics.com/2012/04/skeptics-in-the-pub-with-katherine-stewart/.
item.name: Katherine Stewart at the Boston Skeptics
